info.title: Supaglue CRM API
info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Supaglue unified CRM API documentation. You can use this API to read data that has been synced into Supaglue from third-party providers.

### Base API URL

```
http://localhost:8080/crm/v1
```

externalDocs.description: Try out our API in Postman!

get.description: Get a list of engagement contacts

parameters.name: include_deleted_data
parameters.description: Whether to include data that was deleted in providers.

parameters.name: include_raw_data
parameters.description: Whether to include raw data fetched from the 3rd party provider.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: If provided, will only return objects created after this datetime

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: If provided, will only return objects created before this datetime

parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.description: If provided, will only return objects modified after this datetime

parameters.name: modified_before
parameters.description: If provided, will only return objects modified before this datetime

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The pagination cursor value

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

custom_fields.description: Custom properties to be inserted that are not covered by the common model. Object keys must match exactly to the corresponding provider API.

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: The `Account` Common Model is used to represent a "company" in CRMs.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: The `Contact` Common Model is used to represent a "contact" in CRMs.

tags.name: Leads
tags.description: The `Lead` Common Model is used to represent a "potential customer" in CRMs.

tags.name: Opportunities
tags.description: The `Opportunity` Common Model is used to represent a "deal opportunity" in CRMs.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: The `User` Common Model is used to represent a "user" that can login to CRMs.
